channel.title: How hard/how
channel.description:
I've been drawing a lot in class, and made a cool kind of text.
I was wondering the methods of getting them on line to use, like that.
So basically, a new font.
Any help is appreciated :D

item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

MybJames:

not to mention you have to get fucking good results to be a lawyer.

You reallly don’t.
You don’t need good scores to be a rich lawyer either. My friends dad went to Cornell ILR then to UMich. Now he’s fucking rich.

item.title: How hard/how
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“1337h4x, post:8, topic:142734”][quote author=Casey. link=topic=195279.msg1752929#msg1752929 date=1189661533]

It’s so much harder than it looks tbh. Getting them all pixel perfect the way you want.

But gl.

I can do anything if I work hard enough.
[/quote]Wow, your enthusiasm is blinding me. It disturbs the deep, uncreative cavern that moparisthebest is.

With that kind of additude, you would be an extremely successful businessman. Man, I can’t spell today…[/quote]
Mum says lawyer is the way to go.
(cars, houses, chicks)

Read full topic
